channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Mirrorless Cameras (2025): Full-Frame, APS-C, and More
item.description: Want the image quality of a DSLR without the bulk? These WIRED picks do more with less.

item.title: Anker Nebula X1 Home Projector Review: Gorgeous Anywhere
item.description: This next-generation laser projector pairs with surround-sound speakers and microphones for a cinematic karaoke party.

item.title: Naukri exposed recruiter email addresses, researcher says
item.description: The recruiter website fixed the email address exposure earlier this week.

item.title: DJI Mavic Pro Review: Powerful and Easy to Use
item.description: DJI’s new flagship drone is astonishingly good, but “local conditions” means it’s not yet available in the US.

item.title: Week in Review: Notorious hacking group tied to the Spanish government
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review! Tons of news from this week for you, including a hacking group that’s linked to the Spanish government; CEOs using AI ...

item.title: 7 Best Coffee Pod Machines (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Pod coffee makers are a convenient way to get caffeinated. These are our favorites.

item.title: Why a new anti-revenge porn law has free speech experts alarmed
item.description: The newly signed Take It Down Act makes it illegal to publish nonconsensual explicit images – real or AI-generated – and gives platforms just 48 hours...

item.title: Breville Oracle Jet Review (2025): Easy and Delicious
item.description: The Oracle Jet represents the current state of the art in easy, high-end, delicious home espresso. Geeks will quibble. Most espresso lovers won’t.

item.title: Zoox issues second robotaxi software recall in a month following collision
item.description: Amazon-owned autonomous vehicle company Zoox has issued its second voluntary software recall in a month, following a collision between one of its robo...

item.title: Khosla Ventures among VCs experimenting with AI-infused roll-ups of mature companies
item.description: Venture capitalists have always focused on investing in companies that leverage technology to either disrupt established industries or create entirely...
